Home.seo_title: YAHPA - Young Asian Health Professional Association
Home.seo_description: YAHPA is a non-profit organization based in Montreal, our members include professionals and students from various health fields.
Home.hero_description: We are a group of young professionals and students from various health fields whose mission is to help and support the Asian community in various health-related issues.
Home.registry_title: Interested in being part of our registry?
Home.registry_description: We need health professionals speaking at least one Asian language who would be willing to offer their service to the Asian community.
Home.registry_button: I want to join the registry
Home.news_description: Check out our most recent events interacting with the community via online or outdoor gatherings.
Home.team_description: Our team is growing, and so is our community of students, healthcare professionals and like minded citizens.

About.seo_description: Learn about what YAHPA (Young Asian Health Professional Association) is all about, our goals and the team behind it all.
About.page_description: Learn about the goals and motivation behind YAHPA
About.part1_text: YAHPA (Young Asian Health Professionals Association), emerged in the early days of the COVID-19 pandemic in spring 2020. At that time, misinformation and limited access to services and care were major issues, particularly for seniors and unilingual Asian immigrants living in Quebec. A group of health professionals and students came together to help this community by creating coronavirus information guides, developing community resource lists and translating health measures announcements, all in Asian mother tongues such as Mandarin, Cantonese and Vietnamese. Their goals were to optimize quality and access to care and to reduce inequalities caused by language barriers to the Asian community in Quebec.
About.part2_text: Our mission is to reduce health equity gaps of Asian communities by improving health promotion, disease prevention and access to healthcare through education, direct services, building an interdisciplinary healthcare professional platform and advocacy.
About.goals_description: To foster equitable healthcare access and wellbeing for Asian communities in Quebec through the dissemination of medical knowledge, promotion of holistic health practices, facilitation of healthcare access, celebration of diverse healthcare professions, encouragement of community initiatives among youth, and enhancement of communication skills among healthcare professionals.
About.values_header: To achieve this vision, we are guided by our core values

values.value1: We act for the good of society, dedicating our time and efforts to serve the Asian communities in Quebec.
values.value2: We believe in the power of collaboration, working together to achieve our shared mission and goals.
values.value3: We embrace the rich diversity of Asian communities and healthcare professions, recognizing the unique strengths and perspectives they bring to our organization.
values.value4: We strive to create an inclusive society where all members and Asian communities feel welcomed, respected, and valued.
values.value5: We acknowledge and address the disparities within our communities, ensuring that everyone has equitable access to healthcare resources and opportunities.
values.value6: We embrace innovation by leveraging technology and social media to find new and effective ways to fulfill our mission and reach our audience.

About.leadership_description: The YAHPA leadership team features talented professionals and students with a wide range of experiences in both private and public healthcare institutions.

Registry.seo_title: YAHPA - Registry of Health Care Professionals
Registry.seo_description: Find a health care professional speaking one or more asian languages near you in the greater Montreal area through our registry of members dedicated to serving their community.
Registry.page_description: Find a health care professional speaking one or more asian languages near you in the greater Montreal area through our registry of members dedicated to serving their community.

Projects.seo_description: Learn more about the ongoing projects from YAHPA (Young Asian Health Professional Association) to support the asian community and healthcare professionals in Montreal through outreach events, translated resources, online conferences, and much more.
Projects.page_title: Learn more about our upcoming projects
Projects.page_description: To support our community and the healthcare professionals that interact with them, we are working on projects like organizing outreaching events, translating health resources, online video conferences and much more.

Contact.seo_description: To request any information about our organization, our registry of health professionals, or to discuss any future collaboration with our organization, please contact us through one of our official channels.
